segments.text: Hey , let's go to the night market after work tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . I haven't been in a while and I need to get a new backpack . The old one is hanging on by a thread !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That reminds me I should buy some new socks to go hiking this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
